author: Special Correpsondent
title: Coronavirus | Number of cases doubled in 4.1 days due to Tablighi Jamaat event, says Health Ministry
description: We are chasing the virus, say officials as new cases rise in Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu.
content:
Indias death toll from COVID-19 rose to 83 on Sunday, with 11 fatalities since Saturday. The number of confirmed infections across the country stood at 3,577 cases, with 505 new cases; 274 persons have recovered, the Union Health Ministry said.
